H0.text: Anellini pasta is what type of shape. Spiral

H1.text: Anellini pasta is what type of shape. Tube

H2.text: Anellini pasta is what type of shape. Curl

H3.text: Anellini pasta is what type of shape. Ring

A4.text: Anelli (also known as anellini or anelletti) are small, thin rings of pasta.
